    # toast

    # basic usage

    • Hello, world
    this.Toast("Hello, world");
    1

    # Set toast position

    • toast middle
    this.Toast({ message: "hello, middle", position: "middle" });
    1
    • toast bottom
    this.Toast({ message: "hello, middle", position: "bottom" });
    1
